protein.specific_function: Histone methyltransferase with histone H3 'Lys-27' (H3K27me) methyltransferase activity. Isoform RE-IIBP may act as a transcription regulator that binds DNA and suppresses IL5 transcription through HDAC recruitment.

go_class.description: negative regulation of transcription from RNA polymerase II promoter
